content: That sounds really interesting! I think "The Specials" and "Mystery Men" would be great additions to a movie marathon. I was thinking of doing a superhero movie marathon with my friends again, and these movies would definitely add a nice twist to the usual Marvel and DC movies. By the way, have you heard about the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) movies? I recently had a Marvel movie marathon with my friends where we watched "Iron Man", "Captain America: The First Avenger", and "The Avengers" back to back, and it was so much fun!
